ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters Spell Components
ygData.msgSnippet: Named Orc in Kithicor?  You probably mean Highhold Pass.:)  I haven t ever seen a named orc in Kithicor. Valacian - 20th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Named Orc in Kithicor? You probably mean Highhold Pass.:) I haven't ever seen a named orc in Kithicor.

Valacian - 20th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Shadowwalker [SMTP:Shadowwalker@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 11:44 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Enchanters Spell Components

From: "Shadowwalker" <Shadowwalker@...>

I found a word (can't remember which one) off a named orc in Kithikor
Forest. He was about level 15.

-Shadowwalker
